lead_paragraph: The family of the coaching great John Wooden has a request for his many fans: Please stop sending items for him to autograph. Wooden, who coached U.C.L.A. to a record 10 national titles, is recovering from pneumonia that put him in the hospital. Nan Muehlhausen, Wooden’s daughter, said the family appreciated the support of fans across the country, but certain steps needed to be taken. “Dad is 98 years old and we believe that signing his name for hours on end on a daily basis is not in his best interest,” she said. wooden.
